description:
Join Huffington Post Career Contributor Michael Price for a detailed overview of career strategies that will boost your salary, get you the job of your dreams and allow you to become unemployment-proof and indispensable.

If you want a raise, a dream job and the perks that go along with it, then this course is for you.

The rules of the game have changed and in order for you to reach your potential, get your dream job and maximize your income, there are a series of tactics you must implement. This course shows you how.

This course features over 50 bite-sized video lectures (2-hours) and resource materials on the leading career development components including:

  • Personal branding
  • Networking
  • Social networking
  • Job Search
  • Resume' building
  • Interview skills training
  • Salary negotiation
  • Work life balance
  • Raises & promotions
  • Career change

Enroll now. Every second you delay, youâ€™re losing an opportunity to earn more money and maximize your potential.

Instructor is available for questions via the discussions board within the course dashboard.
title: Become Indispensable and Conquer your Career
